channel.title: Flying Lotus on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Flying Lotus on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, January 2015
item.description: Album Digest January 2015 rounds up a few albums from the tail end of 2014 that I didn’t get much time to write about. The only one of these six to be released this month is the excellent “No Cities To Love” by Sleater-Kinney.
